title: I have to click multiple times to normal cast an ability
body:
I have been having an in game issue with League of Legends.

I use NORMAL CAST, meaning that when I click an ability, the range shows, and I point where I want it to go off. I do not use quick cast, where clicking the ability casts it over what I am hovering. I would ideally like to continue using NORMAL CAST.

The issue I am having causes me to have to click multiple times to cast an ability, like Soraka W, Twitch W, Anivia E, or Dr. Mundo Q. This causes my play to be DRASTICALLY inhibited. This does not happen with self cast abilities like Teemo W or Dr. Mundo R.

I have tested this problem, and it happens with any of the computer mouses that I use. 

In a test ARAM game, where Twitch W was the ability that had to be clicked multiple times, it happened 6/10 times, or 60% of the time.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled League of Legends.

Do you have any idea about what causes this problem or how I can fix it? Thank you so much.

replies.body:
I know that some background applications can sometimes influence your ability to click or interact with League in some ways. I recommend trying a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to see if anything changes without programs running in the background.

Let me know if this caused any change.
